questions.question: Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates help a princess save her kingdom from a Warlord of the Sea who uses sand-based powers. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to transform into a large bird and control ice. What is...?
This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Hawk Eyes', is a master swordsman and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Who is...?
